title: Adventure is Nigh! - Season 1 Recap and Plans for Season 2
description:
With Adventure is Nigh -  The Jade Homunculus complete, we're getting the cast together to talk about their favorite moments, share their character cards and level up their characters...maybe with a few surprises.

title: Stop Bragging About Your Game's Length | Extra Punctuation
description:
This week on Extra Punctuation, Yahtzee discusses the problem with trying to use the metric of game length as a PR selling point, as seen recently with Techland saying Dying Light 2 contains 500 (or 20) hours to complete.
